verbs.description: [ARGM-TMP: Newly] [V: obtained] [ARG1: internal documents] from the Environmental Protection Agency provide a behind - the - scenes look at the Scott Pruitt - led agency — offering evidence of private , high - level meetings at the Trump International Hotel in Washington and lavish dinners for top agency officials both at home and abroad .
